name: DietAssessment
displayName: Group of items providing information on diet assessment.

name: DietAssessment.instrument
displayName: Which dietary assessment instrument is used in the [RESOURCE]? Select one value from the list.

name: DietAssessment.ffqItemsNumber
displayName: How many items were inquired with the FFQ?

name: DietAssessment.mode
dataverseAlias: Mode used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to [RESOURCE] participants
displayName: How was the dietary assessment instrument applied to the [RESOURCE] participants? Select all that apply.

name: DietAssessment.device
dataverseAlias: Device used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to [RESOURCE] participants
displayName: Which device was used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to the [RESOURCE] participants? Select all that apply.

name: DietAssessment.portionSizeEstimation
displayName: How is the portion size inquired in the dietary assessment instrument? Select all that apply.

name: DietAssessment.referencePeriodUnit
displayName: Which reference period is the dietary assessment instrument referring to, e.g. 24-h recall is referring to the previous day. Select one value from the list.

name: DietAssessment.referencePeriodNumber
dataverseAlias: Numerical value of reference period units
displayName: How many of the reference period units were assessed?

name: DietAssessment.repeat
displayName: Was the same instrument applied repeatedly?

name: DietAssessment.repeatFrequency
dataverseAlias: Frequency of applying the dietary assessment instrument
displayName: How often was the dietary assessment instrument repeatedly applied?

name: DietAssessment.validity
displayName: Was the dietary assessment instrument validated?

name: DietAssessment.validityReference
dataverseAlias: Please provide a reference describing the validation.

name: DietAssessment.reliability
displayName: Was the dietary assessment instrument described according to its reliability?

name: DietAssessment.reliabilityReference
dataverseAlias: Please provide a reference describing the reliability measures.

name: DietAssessment.dietarySupplements
displayName: Does the dietary assessment instrument inquire information about dietary supplements?
